p: Results: The group (1) with 2077 patients (56 % male) had a mean age of 60.0 ± 18.9; SAPS3 41.1 ± 13.3; ICU stay 6.8d ± 10.3; hospitalization 19.2d ± 35.6 while group (2) with 264 (58 % male) had a mean age of 62.4y ± 15.9; SAPS3 42.2 ± 12.9; ICU stay 6.9d ± 9.6; hospitalization 20.4d ± 27.4. None of these values showed significance with the Student-t.
